responses.rationale: The segment describes current and potential future negative impacts (prices) but not capabilities or preparedness measures.
Describes a safeguard/response measure ('Disease precautions kept Fox Business from visiting').
Describes a response measure/protocol ('if one bird is infected... the whole flock has to go').
Describes a preparedness/surveillance measure ('watching the outbreak closely').

Describes the effect of a response measure/capability ('Depopulation stops the virus').
Describes the goal of response measures ('don’t want the farm spreading the virus').
